name: Arkajoined
description:
ARKAJOINED
  • Use the mouse to move the jumper at the top of the screen
  • The paddle at the bottom follows the jumper
  • Click to jump and launch the ball from the paddle
  • Smash bricks with the ball
  • Get the jumper to the paddle to win!

Can you beat Level 3?

Audio from freesound.org
  • impact zap 2 by Beman87
  • ooh by Reitanna
  • laser-gun by Morgan Purkis
  • failure drum sound effect 2 by FunWithSound
  • success fanfare trumpets by FunWithSound
  • kill-impact by MadPancake
